lines.text:
[spying on a man who's cheating on his wife]
Eh, Thompson, you got steak at home and you're out getting a chili dog.

[pointing an automatic pistol at Eddie]
Let's go, shows over.
What, no cartoon?
Katrina wants you to date her cousin.
Forget it! Taking out your food is risky enough.

[carrying a fish bowl]
Mrs Karwacky, I know you like animals, please take Stan & Ollie into your home.
I spend the night under a plant that looked like Audrey II.
Are you... Smitty?
Do I look like a Smitty?
You know anything about my partners' death?
I read the papers. Even the big words.
What's the matter? You just landed the biggest case on the island.
I wanted a burger, I got a stampede.
If it was murder, do you suspect that it might have been somebody in my company that killed him?
Caesar wasn't stabbed by strangers.
Whoa, it's late. What'd you do all day?

Lets see, eh, bought a car, bought a business. Hired some help, signed a client, worded with his wife. Got the hots for his ward, but, eh, she dates Popeye the druggist. And I started looking for a killer. Also, I had a Danish.
I had the same kinda day.
Yeah?
Yeah. I had a Danish.
a surfer who lost his board.
What's he gonna pay with, sand?
Hey pal, you! You've been looking at the lady long enough. If you ain't engaged by now, it's never gonna happen. That's five bills, or peddle on outta here!
[the man puts down the magazine and goes]
I hate cheap perves! Your perves are ok. It's the cheap ones I can't stand.
So far I've talked to four people, including the client. And they're all like lake fall squirrels, hiding everything. Or do the squirrels out here just lie on the beach and rent jet-skis?
Hey, just, eh, promise you'll take me on a case some day?
As soon as we get a little more steady work.
Hey, maybe I could, eh, carry a rod?
[indicating a gun with his fingers]
Only if you're expecting lightning.
Your type solves problems by running over them.
I gotta go see a man about a surfboard. I'll get those personal files right after.
Sooner better than later, later better than not at all.
Chinese fortune cookie?
A men's room in Newark.
Are you prone to seasickness?
I wouldn't know. I just don't like water that isn't in a container.
Are we armed?
My wit, your charm.
Can I switch sides?
I got a plan. Here. You be the stick, I'll be the stone.
I wanna be the stone. It's cuter.
Is there an ancient Hawaiian proverb about how sometimes the bear bites you, sometimes you bite the bear?
no bears.
